name: spo-get-all-apps-from-appcatalog
title: Get All Apps From The App Catalog And Export It To CSV
shortDescription: This script sample shows how to get all apps from the app catalog and export it to CSV.
longDescription: In This script sample, first we will connect to the SharePoint admin site, get all apps from the app catalog and export it to CSV with all required details.

references.name: Want to learn more about PnP PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the PnP PowerShell site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
